Ingredients.1: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped

Ingredients.2: 1 (6 ounce) can marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped

Ingredients.3: 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers, drained

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: In a medium bowl, mix artichoke hearts, marinated artichoke hearts, green chile peppers, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese and mozzarella cheese.

Directions.3: Spread the mixture in a small baking dish. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, until lightly browned and bubbly.
